languages.text: "Домин". {n}Кибелла вздергивает подбородок, ее глаза черны, как сама бездна.{/n} "Мне ведомо, что {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}ты решил{mf||а} связать себя с иной нитью{/d}. Что ж, я покоряюсь твоей воле и отныне буду довольствоваться ролью лишь клинка и тени — единственных нерушимых уз, что мне дозволены".

"Domin." {n}Kibellah raises her chin, her eyes black as the abyss.{/n} "I know {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}you have decided to bind yourself to the thread of another{/d}. So be it. I submit to your will. From now on, I will content myself with the role of blade and shadow — the only unbreakable bond I am permitted to have."
languages.original_text: "Домин". {n}Кибелла вздергивает подбородок, ее глаза черны, как сама бездна.{/n} "Мне ведомо, что {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}ты решил{mf||а} связать себя с иной нитью{/d}. Что ж, я покоряюсь твоей воле и отныне буду довольствоваться ролью лишь клинка и тени — единственных нерушимых уз, что мне дозволены".

"Domin." {n}Kibellah raises her chin, her eyes black as the abyss.{/n} "I know {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}you have decided to bind yourself to the thread of another{/d}. So be it. I submit to your will. From now on, I will content myself with the role of blade and shadow — the only unbreakable bond I am permitted to have."

languages.text: « Domin. » {n}Kibellah lève le menton, les yeux aussi noirs que l'abysse.{/n} « Je sais que {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}vous avez décidé de lier votre fil à quelqu'un d'autre{/d}. Qu'il en soit ainsi. Je me soumets à votre volonté. Dorénavant, je me contenterai du rôle de lame et d'ombre… Le seul lien indéfectible qu'il me soit permis de tisser. »
languages.original_text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah raises her chin, her eyes black as the abyss.{/n} "I know {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}you have decided to bind yourself to the thread of another{/d}. So be it. I submit to your will. From now on, I will content myself with the role of blade and shadow — the only unbreakable bond I am permitted to have."

traits.locale_text: « Domin. » {n}Kibellah lève le menton, les yeux aussi noirs que l'abysse.{/n} « Je sais que {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}vous avez décidé de lier votre fil à quelqu'un d'autre{/d}. Qu'il en soit ainsi. Je me soumets à votre volonté. Dorénavant, je me contenterai du rôle de lame et d'ombre… Le seul lien indéfectible qu'il me soit permis de tisser. »

languages.text: “秘者。”{n}绮贝菈扬起下巴，黑色的双眼如同深渊一般。{/n}“我已经得知，{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}你决定将你的命运之线与其他人相连{/d}。如你所愿，我遵从你的意志。从现在开始，我将仅仅是你的利刃、你的坚盾、你的影子，这便是我唯一拥有的、坚不可摧的联结。”
languages.original_text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah raises her chin, her eyes black as the abyss.{/n} "I know {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}you have decided to bind yourself to the thread of another{/d}. So be it. I submit to your will. From now on, I will content myself with the role of blade and shadow — the only unbreakable bond I am permitted to have."

traits.locale_text: “秘者。”{n}绮贝菈扬起下巴，黑色的双眼如同深渊一般。{/n}“我已经得知，{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}你决定将你的命运之线与其他人相连{/d}。如你所愿，我遵从你的意志。从现在开始，我将仅仅是你的利刃、你的坚盾、你的影子，这便是我唯一拥有的、坚不可摧的联结。”

languages.text: 「ドミン」{n}キベラは顔を上げた。その瞳は深淵のように黒かった。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}あなたが別の者の絆に身を委ねると決めたこと{/d}は知っています。仕方ありません。私はあなたの意志に従います。これからは、私が許される唯一の不変の絆である刃と影の役割に満足しましょう」
languages.original_text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah raises her chin, her eyes black as the abyss.{/n} "I know {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}you have decided to bind yourself to the thread of another{/d}. So be it. I submit to your will. From now on, I will content myself with the role of blade and shadow — the only unbreakable bond I am permitted to have."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン」{n}キベラは顔を上げた。その瞳は深淵のように黒かった。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}あなたが別の者の絆に身を委ねると決めたこと{/d}は知っています。仕方ありません。私はあなたの意志に従います。これからは、私が許される唯一の不変の絆である刃と影の役割に満足しましょう」

languages.text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah çenesini dikleştiriyor. Gözleri zifirî bir girdabı andırıyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Kaderini bir başkasıyla birleştirmeye karar verdiğinin{/d} farkındayım. Öyle olsun. İradene sesimi çıkartacak hâlim yok. Bundan böyle sahip olmama müsaade edilen yegâne kopmaz bağla, kılıç ve gölge rolünü üstlenmekle yetineceğim."
languages.original_text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah raises her chin, her eyes black as the abyss.{/n} "I know {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}you have decided to bind yourself to the thread of another{/d}. So be it. I submit to your will. From now on, I will content myself with the role of blade and shadow — the only unbreakable bond I am permitted to have."

traits.locale_text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah çenesini dikleştiriyor. Gözleri zifiri bir girdabı andırıyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Kaderini bir başkasıyla birleştirmeye karar verdiğinin{/d} farkındayım. Peki, öyle olsun. İradene sesimi çıkartacak hâlim yok. Bundan böyle sahip olmama müsaade edilen yegâne kopmaz bağla, kılıç ve gölge rolünü üstlenmekle yetineceğim."

languages.text: «Domin». {n}Kibellah alza la cabeza con ojos tan negros como el abismo.{/n} «Sé que {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}ha decidido vincularse al hilo de otra persona{/d}. Que así sea. Me someto a su voluntad. A partir de ahora, me contentaré con la función de espada y sombra: el único vínculo inquebrantable que se me permite».
languages.original_text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah raises her chin, her eyes black as the abyss.{/n} "I know {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}you have decided to bind yourself to the thread of another{/d}. So be it. I submit to your will. From now on, I will content myself with the role of blade and shadow — the only unbreakable bond I am permitted to have."

traits.locale_text: «Domin». {n}Kibellah alza la cabeza con ojos tan negros como el abismo.{/n} «Sé que {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}ha decidido vincularse al hilo de otra persona{/d}. Que así sea. Me someto a su voluntad. A partir de ahora, me contentaré con la función de espada y sombra: el único vínculo inquebrantable que se me permite».

languages.text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah reckt das Kinn, ihre Augen sind schwarz der Abgrund.{/n} "Ich weiß, {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}dass Ihr beschlossen habt, Euch an den Faden von jemand anderen zu binden{/d}. So sei es. Ich unterwerfe mich Eurem Willen. Von nun an werde ich mich mit der Rolle von Klinge und Schatten begnügen – das einzige unverbrüchliche Band, das mir gestattet wird."
languages.original_text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah raises her chin, her eyes black as the abyss.{/n} "I know {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}you have decided to bind yourself to the thread of another{/d}. So be it. I submit to your will. From now on, I will content myself with the role of blade and shadow — the only unbreakable bond I am permitted to have."

traits.locale_text: "Domin." {n}Kibellah reckt das Kinn, ihre Augen sind schwarz der Abgrund.{/n} "Ich weiß, {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}dass Ihr beschlossen habt, Euch an den Faden von jemand anderen zu binden{/d}. So sei es. Ich unterwerfe mich Eurem Willen. Von nun an werde ich mich mit der Rolle von Klinge und Schatten begnügen – das einzige unverbrüchliche Band, das mir gestattet wird."
